6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The women used to pray Subh with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), wrapped in their wrappers, then they would return, and no one would recognize them because of the darkness

chapter.eng-name: At-Taghlis (Praying Fajr While It Is Still Dark) While a Resident
